EmailTemplate.name: Grand & Toy next steps (1560266890.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy next steps (1560266890.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
​Good morning Jennifer,
I apologies if this is the first time you are receiving this email. I sent it last week right after you and I spoke however, my new email platform may have not sent it properly.
On our call, we discussed the following next steps.
Next Steps: - Account Application Form (see attached in separate email to follow) Please fill out the following 1) Business Information 2) Contact Information 3) Additional Information 4) Account Agreement - Signature on the bottom of the form Then email it back to me and I will submit this right away. These items could be a great start for us to add to your program at competitive pricing. 1) Garbage Bags 2) Inks/Toners 3) Coffee and Breakroom Supplies 4) Facilities Supplies, such as janitorial supplies, equipment (Mop Buckets, mops etc), Cleaners/Chemicals etc 5) Office Supplies Which items are important to you? May you please send over some past invoices? We can then take a look at the sku#’s and cross them to our stocked sku’s and show you some pricing. I will email you the account application in a 2nd email. Thank you, Jennifer. Tomas Hansen Business Development Manager, Corporate Sales | Lower Mainland, BC 4560 Tillicum St. | Burnaby BC Canada | V5J 5L4 E-mail: tomashansen@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:tomashansen@grandandtoy.com]]> | Mobile: 604-649-2145 | Web: grandandtoy.com <[[http://grandandtoy.com/]]> TECHNOLOGY AND NETWORKING SOLUTIONS | COFFEE AND BREAKROOM SUPPLIES | OFFICE SUPPLIES | INTERIORS AND FURNITURE | FACILITY CLEANING SUPPLIES | PROCUREMENT STREAMLINING SOLUTIONS CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The content of this e-mail (and attachments, if any) is privileged and confidential, and intended solely for its designated recipient(s). Any dissemination, distribution or copying of this e-mail, other than by its intended recipient(s), is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail by error, please delete it and notify us immediately by reply e-mail.
